text: A distressed small hotel owner who is a constituent tonight contacted me to say they’ve lost “2 rooms for 5 nights and 10 rooms for 7 nights in August and Sept” due to customers concerned they “will not be allowed over the border”. They only have a small 12 bed borders hotel.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
